Package com.opengamma.strata.product.common

Enum LongShort

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<LongShort>
      • com.opengamma.strata.product.common.LongShort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named, NamedEnum, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<LongShort>
    public enum LongShort
extends java.lang.Enum<LongShort>
implements NamedEnum
    Flag indicating whether a trade is "long" or "short".

    A long position is one where a financial instrument is bought with the expectation that its value will rise. A short position is the opposite where the expectation is that its value will fall, usually applied to the sale of a borrowed asset.
